name: The Devil's Garden
description:
A terrible accident has wiped out all of your fellow colleagues at DRX BIO CORP. Mutated humanoids are on the loose. Suit up and make it to the safe zone!

FEATURES:

* Multiple ways to explore and use your defense tactics to reach the safe zone

* Brutal close range & long range combat

* Various weapon types

* Large, functional environments

* Gain access to all future episodes by purchasing TDG in early access
